name: LanguageServiceClient
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient
description: Provides text analysis operations such as sentiment analysis and entity recognition.

params.name: service_path
params.description: The domain name of the API remote host.

params.name: port
params.description: The port on which to connect to the remote host.

params.name: channel
params.description: A Channel object through which to make calls.

params.name: chan_creds
params.description: A ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client.

params.name: updater_proc
params.description:
A function that transforms the metadata for requests, e.g., to give
OAuth credentials.

params.name: scopes
params.description:
The OAuth scopes for this service. This parameter is ignored if
an updater_proc is supplied.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

methods.name: analyze_sentiment
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient#analyze_sentiment
methods.description: Analyzes the sentiment of the provided text.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/language/v1"

Document = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::Document
LanguageServiceClient = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::LanguageServiceClient

language_service_client = LanguageServiceClient.new
document = Document.new
response = language_service_client.analyze_sentiment(document)

params.name: document
params.description:
Input document. Currently, +analyzeSentiment+ only supports English text
(Document#language=”EN”).

params.name: encoding_type
params.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate sentence offsets.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: analyze_entities
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient#analyze_entities
methods.description: Finds named entities (currently proper names and common nouns) in the text along with entity types, salience, mentions for each entity, and other properties.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/language/v1"

Document = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::Document
EncodingType = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::EncodingType
LanguageServiceClient = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::LanguageServiceClient

language_service_client = LanguageServiceClient.new
document = Document.new
encoding_type = EncodingType::NONE
response = language_service_client.analyze_entities(document, encoding_type)

params.name: document
params.description: Input document.

params.name: encoding_type
params.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: analyze_syntax
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient#analyze_syntax
methods.description: Analyzes the syntax of the text and provides sentence boundaries and tokenization along with part of speech tags, dependency trees, and other properties.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/language/v1"

Document = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::Document
EncodingType = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::EncodingType
LanguageServiceClient = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::LanguageServiceClient

language_service_client = LanguageServiceClient.new
document = Document.new
encoding_type = EncodingType::NONE
response = language_service_client.analyze_syntax(document, encoding_type)

params.name: document
params.description: Input document.

params.name: encoding_type
params.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: annotate_text
title: Google
Cloud
Language
V1
LanguageServiceClient#annotate_text
methods.description: A convenience method that provides all the features that analyzeSentiment, analyzeEntities, and analyzeSyntax provide in one call.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/language/v1"

Document = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::Document
EncodingType = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::EncodingType
Features = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::AnnotateTextRequest::Features
LanguageServiceClient = Google::Cloud::Language::V1::LanguageServiceClient

language_service_client = LanguageServiceClient.new
document = Document.new
features = Features.new
encoding_type = EncodingType::NONE
response = language_service_client.annotate_text(document, features, encoding_type)

params.name: document
params.description: Input document.

params.name: features
params.description: The enabled features.

params.name: encoding_type
params.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
